import React,{useContext}from'react';import'./Ingredient.css';import{ConsoleContext}from"../ConsoleContext";import{useFetch}from'../../utils/Hook';import _ from"lodash";import NoData from"../../componenets/NoData";import Loader from"../../componenets/Loader";import authHeader from"../../utils/auth-header";import{CONSTANTS}from'../../utils/constants';var Ingredient=function Ingredient(){var _useContext=useContext(ConsoleContext),productContext=_useContext.productContext,languageContext=_useContext.languageContext;var _useFetch=useFetch({url:"".concat(CONSTANTS.URL_PREFIX,"://prody.me/api/product_page_ingredients/").concat(productContext),header:authHeader(),method:'GET',dep1:productContext}),data=_useFetch.data,loading=_useFetch.loading;var title=function title(){if(languageContext==='ENG'){return React.createElement("div",{style:{'fontWeight':'bold'}},"Ingredients");}else if(languageContext==='HEB'){return React.createElement("div",{style:{'fontWeight':'bold'}},"\u05E8\u05DB\u05D9\u05D1\u05D9\u05DD");}};var content=function content(){if(loading){return React.createElement(Loader,null);}else if(!data.length){return React.createElement(NoData,null);}else{var sortedData=_.sortBy(data[0].ingredients,function(data){return parseInt(data.line_order,10);});return sortedData.map(function(ingredient,index){if(languageContext==='ENG'){return React.createElement("div",{key:index,className:"ingredientEng"},ingredient.desc_eng,React.createElement("span",{className:ingredient.details_eng?'tooltiptext':'notooltip'},ingredient.details_eng));}else if(languageContext==='HEB'){return React.createElement("div",{key:index,className:"ingredientHeb"},ingredient.desc_heb,React.createElement("span",{className:ingredient.details_heb?'tooltiptext':'notooltip'},ingredient.details_heb));}});}};var containerClass=function containerClass(){if(languageContext==='ENG'){return'ingredientContainerEng';}else if(languageContext==='HEB'){return'ingredientContainerHeb';}};return React.createElement("div",{className:containerClass()},title(),React.createElement("div",{className:"ingredientContent"},content()));};export default Ingredient;// TODO: add market to endpoint
